

# Vapour pressure deficit (VPD) 


The vapour pressure deficit (VPD) is calculated as presented in Equation \@ref(eq:VPD).
VPD affects the transpiration efficiency (Equation \@ref(eq:TranspirationEfficiency))
and thus the crop water demand (Equation \@ref(eq:soilWaterDemand)).
